'''Impeccably Organized''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Grainfruit Chips]] with [[Kachina]]. The [[recipe]] for Grainfruit Chips can be purchased from [[Cipac]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

Impeccably Organized restores '''26'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''570''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
